tool_description: An API filled with famous quotes and their authors.
title: Random Quote API

api_list.name: Get a random quote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-quote-api1.p.rapidapi.com/randomQuote"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-quote-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all quotes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-quote-api1.p.rapidapi.com/quotes"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-quote-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
